name: Pupillio
description:
Pupillio is a short interactive fiction/virtual pet game where you have to make quick decisions that affect the outcome of your newly hatched Pupillio!

Inspired by original virtual pets such as Tamagatchi, we took on the "Nothing stays forever" theme to mean a few different things:

  1.  The fad of virtual-pets itself did not stay around forever.
  2. The time-based events don't give much reaction time, and the content of the events could leave you with questions you don't have the time for.
  3. The Pupillio is going to be ultimately affected by how you have taken care of it. They will not be your cute little pal forever.
  4. No matter the outcome, Pupillio loved and cherished your brief time together.
Gameplay
  • The game will play out 3 random quick-decision events where you will use the mouse to select your reaction as Pupillio's handler. Each event only gives you a few seconds to make a choice.
  • You will then enter passive mode where you can take your time to feed, play with, and check the mood of your Pupillio. 
  • The Sleep button will be used to proceed to the next day, with a new selection of random events.
  • After 3 days, Sleep will proceed to the end of the game.
